# Claude Agent SDK for Laravel

> Laravel SDK for Claude Code â€” build AI agents with Claude Code as a library in PHP/Laravel applications.

## Overview

This package wraps the Claude Code CLI to provide a fluent PHP/Laravel interface for building AI agents. It supports file operations, bash commands, code editing, web search, subagents, MCP servers, structured JSON output, session management, and streaming.

## Install

composer require mohamed-ashraf-elsaed/claude-agent-sdk-laravel

## Requirements

- PHP 8.1+
- Laravel 10, 11, or 12
- Claude Code CLI: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code
- Anthropic API key

## Quick Start

use ClaudeAgentSDK\Facades\ClaudeAgent;

$result = ClaudeAgent::query('What files are in this directory?');
echo $result->text();

## Key Features

- Fluent options builder (ClaudeAgentOptions)
- Streaming with real-time message processing
- Subagents for task delegation
- MCP server integration (stdio + SSE)
- Structured output with JSON schema validation
- Session resumption and forking
- Full message/content block parsing
- Laravel service provider, facade, and config publishing

## Links

- Packagist: https://packagist.org/packages/mohamed-ashraf-elsaed/claude-agent-sdk-laravel
- GitHub: https://github.com/mohamed-ashraf-elsaed/claude-agent-sdk-laravel
